original_title: LUNA SEA 20th Anniversary World Tour REBOOT -to the New Moon- 24th December, 2010 at TOKYO DOME
overview: Live music Blu-ray of the band's 20th anniversary gig in Tokyo Dome, Christmas Eve 2010.
